0.name: Hundred Rockets
0.fullDesc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Tribbie's Max HP to one designated enemy. Deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Tribbie's Max HP to adjacent targets.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one enemy and adjacent targets.

0.name: Where'd the Gifts Go
0.fullDesc: Gains "Numinosity," lasting for {{2}} turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of this unit's every turn. While Tribbie has "Numinosity," increases all ally targets' All-Type RES PEN by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>.
0.shortDesc: Gains "Numinosity," during which all ally targets have their All-Type RES PEN increased.

0.name: Guess Who Lives Here
0.fullDesc:
Activates a Zone and deals Quantum DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of Tribbie's Max HP to all enemies.
While the Zone lasts, increases enemy targets' DMG taken by {{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%. After an ally target attacks, for every 1 target hit, deals 1 instance of Quantum Additional DMG equal to {{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}% of Tribbie's Max HP to the target that has the highest HP among the hit targets.
The Zone lasts for {{4}} turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of this unit's every turn.
0.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Activates a Zone</orangeStrong> and deals minor Quantum DMG to all enemies. While the Zone lasts, increases the DMG taken by enemies and deals minor Quantum <orangeStrong>Additional DMG</orangeStrong> to the target that has the highest HP among the hit targets based on <orangeStrong>the number of enemies</orangeStrong> attacked.

0.name: Busy as Tribbie
0.fullDesc: After other ally characters use Ultimate, Tribbie launches Follow-up ATK, dealing Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> of Tribbie's Max HP to all enemies. This effect triggers up to 1 time per character. When Tribbie uses Ultimate, resets the trigger count for other ally characters. If the target was defeated before the Follow-up ATK is launched, then launches the Follow-up ATK against new enemy targets entering the battlefield.
0.shortDesc: After other ally characters use Ultimate, Tribbie launches <orangeStrong>Follow-up ATK</orangeStrong>, dealing minor Quantum DMG to <orangeStrong>all enemies</orangeStrong>. This effect triggers up to 1 time per character. When Tribbie uses Ultimate, resets the trigger count for other ally characters.

0.name: If You're Happy and You Know It
0.fullDesc: After using Technique and upon entering battle, obtains "Numinosity," lasting for {{1}} turn(s).

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: Lamb Outside the Wall...
0.fullDesc: After using Talent's Follow-up ATK, increases the DMG dealt by Tribbie by {{1, percent}}%. This effect can stack up to {{2}} time(s), lasting for {{3}} turn(s).

0.name: Glass Ball with Wings!
0.fullDesc: While the Zone lasts, Tribbie's Max HP increases by an amount equal to {{1, percent}}% of the sum of all ally characters' Max HP.

0.name: Pebble at Crossroads?
0.fullDesc: At the start of battle, Tribbie regenerates {{1}} Energy. After other ally targets attack, Tribbie regenerates {{2, fixed(fixed: 1)}} Energy for each target hit.

1.name: Rite of Sugar Scoop
1.desc: While the Zone lasts and after ally targets attack enemies, additionally deals True DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of the total DMG of this attack to targets that have been dealt Additional DMG by the Zone.

2.name: Guide of Dream Tour
2.desc: The Additional DMG dealt by the Zone increases to {{1, percent}}% of the original DMG. When the Zone deals Additional DMG, further deals {{2}} instance(s) of Additional DMG.

3.name: Trove of Morning Glow
3.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

4.name: Peace of Empathy Bond
4.desc: While "Numinosity" lasts, the DMG dealt by all allies ignores {{1, percent}}% of the target's DEF.

5.name: Clock of Wonder Origin
5.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

6.name: Morrow of Star Shine
6.desc: After Tribbie uses Ultimate, launches her Talent's Follow-up ATK against all enemies. The DMG dealt by Talent's Follow-up ATK increases by {{1, percent}}%.
